name: Alexander Ralf
description: A little about Alexander Ralf,I am 46 years old, I was born in Breme, Germany before moving to Miami…..I love to show love and affection especially when I am in love ummm.I enjoy the simple things, like dancing, cooking,I love good music,jazz,R n B country music, and love to shopping when I am less busy. I love romantic dinners, walks on the beaches, in the park,sunrises, sunsets, and watch the stars at night to just appreciate **** and his wonders. I Love to show affection, touching and be touched.I am looking for a long term relationship/Marriage,not a one night stand….I am divorce,so you can have me all to yourself LOL.
